channel.title: BlazinRescuer || Looking for a lore/story teller for forums
channel.description: BlazinRescuer is a RS remake, We are currently in the development stages of our server and trying to get every one we need to make this launch go as smoothly as possible, we currently are in need of a story teller to fill up the lore section of forums. Anyone with a vivid imagination is welcome. Right now we would like the story teller to concentrate mainly on " Halloween " themed stories.

item.title: BlazinRescuer || Looking for a lore/story teller for forums
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

Fails:

this is meant to be a dev team thread?

appreciate the bump

Read full topic
